Wisdom: أَلَا إِنَّهُ لَيْسَ لِأَنْفُسِكُمْ ثَمَنٌ إِلَّا الْجَنَّةُ فَلَا تَبِيعُوهَا إِلَّا بِهَا
enWisdom: Indeed there is no price for your souls other than Paradise, so do not sell them except [in return] for it

Wisdom: إِنَّ مَنْ بَاعَ نَفْسَهُ بِغَيْرِ الْجَنَّةِ فَقَدْ عَظُمَتْ عَلَيْهِ الْمِحْنَةُ
enWisdom: Indeed the one who sells his soul for anything other than Paradise suffers great tribulation

Wisdom: لَيْسَ [لَبِئْسَ‏] الْمَتْجَرُ أَنْ تَرَى الدُّنْيَا لِنَفْسِكَ ثَمَناً وَمِمَّا لَكَ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ عِوَضاً
enWisdom: It is not a [good] trade to consider this world to be a price for your soul and a substitute to that which is for you with Allah

Wisdom: لَيْسَ لِأَنْفُسِكُمْ ثَمَنٌ إِلَّا الْجَنَّةُ فَلَا تَبِيعُوهَا إِلَّا بِهَا
enWisdom: Verily your souls have [great] value, so do not sell them except for Paradise

Wisdom: لَيْسَ عَنِ الْآخِرَةِ عِوَضٌ وَلَيْسَتِ الدُّنْيَا لِلنَّفْسِ بِثَمَنٍ
enWisdom: There is no substitute for the Hereafter; and this world is not the price of one’s soul

Wisdom: مَنْ بَاعَ نَفْسَهُ بِغَيْرِ نَعِيمِ الْجَنَّةِ فَقَدْ ظَلَمَهَا
enWisdom: Whoever sells his soul for other than the bliss of Paradise has indeed oppressed it
